DOC.brief_summary: A phase 2, multicenter, randomized, active-controlled, masked, parallel arm study designed to evaluate the safety and efficacy of a single suprachoroidal injection of CLS-TA, triamcinolone acetonide injectable suspension, given along with an intravitreal (IVT) injection of aflibercept compared to IVT aflibercept alone in subjects with retinal vein occlusion (RVO).
DOC.brief_title: Suprachoroidal Injection of Triamcinolone Acetonide With IVT Aflibercept in Subjects With Macular Edema Following RVO
